Lemon & Thyme Sausages
2.75Kg Pork Voressen (guess it was 20% Fat)
300g Pork Backfat
22ml Black Pepper
40g Salt
250ml White Wine
6 small preserved lemons (use the diced peel only)
30ml Thyme leaves
  1. Standard sausage method
  2. Minced everything through large die, might be better to use medium die for at least some of the mix
Footer - not much here really
